DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate therapeutic effectiveness micronutrient ( full RDA ) micronutrient + fish oil separate intervention restore normal gut absorptive immunological function measure dual sugar permeability test additional biomarkers 1-3 year old rural Malawian child high risk Environmental Enteropathy .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Micronutrient Supplementation Fish Oil + Micronutrient Supplementation Treatment Environmental Enteropathy
DOC.criteria: 13 year age Lives study village Will move next 6 month Caregiver willing give intervention daily 6 month Unable drink 20 mL sugar water Demonstrating evidence severe acute malnutrition , WHZ < = 3 , presence bipedal pit edema Apparent need acute medical treatment illness injury Caregiver refusal participate return 3 6 month followup
